item.description:
Lets go do some wild fun stuff like Whooping up a storm to a good band that brings a pretty good following from what I have seen and try some new places as well, remember dancing and more dancing and a way to meet new people and refresher for old people, we work hard to play hard!!!

I'd say get there by at least 7:30 for dinner, if you'd like...or just come to dance later, for a great band Wildfire...and this place is very new and spacious, plenty of tvs for your viewing pleasure, separate dining, big bar and decent dance floor. come meet, greet and even eat, than dance off a few pounds



Band: WILDFIRE


Scoreboard Sports Bar and Grill
Place page

15 Middlesex Canal Park
Woburn, MA 01801
(781) 897-4000

..

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Come Out To Dance And Have Some Fun
